vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀσχημ-ονέω,
behave unseemly, disgrace oneself, [Refs 5th c.BC+]: with participle, [Refs 1st c.AD+] —passive, πολλὰ ἀσχημονεῖται many unseemly things are done, [Refs 1st c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to act improperly, dishonourably, indecently, rudely
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to act improperly, dishonourably, indecently, rudely
to behave in an unbecoming manner, or indecorously, improperly, dishonourably, indecently, rudely 1Cor. 13:5; to behave in a manner open to censure, 1Cor. 7:36*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 作出不得體, 不適當的行為 (林前 7:36, 13:5)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 作出不得体, 不适当的行为 (林前 7:36, 13:5)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: cư xử trái lẽ; hành vi không đứng đắn, đáng xấu hổ
